name: Safe Arbor
description:
Vaguely resembles a rpg.

Keybinds

EscToggle main menuCombat
FFinish deployment, Confirm targeting1-4Use ability. F to confirm, esc to cancelVMove. Right click to confirm, esc to cancelSpaceEnd Turn
Middle MouseMove camera
ScrollwheelZoom in/outMap
Right clickMove to nodeMiddle MouseDrag map
